instructions: Do one of the following: Tap the cell, then tap Record Into Cell from the shortcut menu. Double-tap the cell. The Touch Instrument for the cell s row opens. If the cell is in an empty row, the last-used Touch Instrument opens, and becomes the Touch Instrument for the cell s row. If no cell has been used, double-tapping shows the Edit menu. To start recording, tap the Record button Record button in the control bar. Play the Touch Instrument. The notes you play, and any changes to knobs, sliders, and other controls, are recorded. To finish recording, tap the Record button again. Tap the Grid button Grid button to return to the Live Loops grid.
